title: Classic Red Shirt
description: Comfortable 100% cotton shirt for daily wear.
longDescription: The Classic Red Shirt is crafted from breathable cotton fabric that ensures comfort and durability. Ideal for both casual and semi-formal occasions, it pairs well with jeans or chinos.

title: Denim Jeans
longDescription: These Denim Jeans offer a comfortable regular fit and are made from high-quality stretchable fabric. Reinforced stitching and classic styling make them a wardrobe essential.

title: Sport Running Shoes
longDescription: Designed for comfort and performance, these running shoes feature a breathable mesh upper, cushioned sole, and anti-slip grip â€” perfect for workouts or casual outings.

title: Leather Wallet
description: Genuine leather wallet with multiple compartments.
longDescription: This premium leather wallet offers durability and elegance. Includes multiple slots for cards, cash, and IDs, with a sleek design that fits perfectly in your pocket.

title: Smart Watch
description: Fitness tracking smartwatch with heart-rate monitor.
longDescription: Track your steps, workouts, and heart rate in real time. The Smart Watch features a crisp display, customizable faces, and long battery life for everyday use.

title: Classic White Sneakers
description: Minimalist sneakers for a clean, casual look.
longDescription: These white sneakers are designed with a timeless silhouette and soft cushioning for all-day comfort. They easily pair with jeans, shorts, or chinos.

title: Casual Hoodie
description: Soft fleece hoodie with adjustable drawstrings.
longDescription: Made from a cozy cotton-poly blend, this hoodie keeps you warm during chilly days. Features a front pocket and ribbed cuffs for a snug fit.

title: Sunglasses
longDescription: Stylish aviator sunglasses with UV400 protection. Perfect for sunny days, offering clear vision and a lightweight metal frame for a premium look.

title: Analog Wrist Watch
description: Elegant analog watch with leather strap.
longDescription: This analog wristwatch combines modern craftsmanship with a classic design. Features precise quartz movement and a genuine leather strap for long-lasting comfort.
